member.name: IPropertyChange.ApplyToPropVariant
member.summary: Applies a change to a property value.
member.param: A reference to a source structure.
A pointer to a changed structure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyChange
member.summary: Exposes a method that encapsulates a change to a single property.
